name_original: The Truth (GriDie Games, Danixo, MoercLP, kggx)
description:
Horror Survival - The Truth

Mr. Smith a detectiv is investigating a new crime but this crime feels different than all crimes he had before. The house, the weather, the time.. everything.. feels dark and lifeless. It goes even further, when he starts hearing noices.. in.. his.. head. 

Features

Inventory System

Interactive Items

Horror House Design

Known Issues:

  • Game starts in level and not the Main Menu
  • Knife is not interactable
  • Flashlight is too bright
  • Some items spawn multiple times
  • Reflection Issues
